trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that lays out cells and column headers in a data grid.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來配置資料格中之儲存格和資料行標題的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel> is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter> to lay out cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel>做<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter>配置資料列中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: It is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter> to lay out column headers.
trans-unit.target: 它會當做使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter>配置資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: The panel arranges cells horizontally and uses each cell's column information to determine the correct size for each cell.
trans-unit.target: 面板水平排列資料格，並使用每個儲存格的資料行資訊來判斷正確的大小，每個資料格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the panel can occupy.
trans-unit.target: 面板可以佔用的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: Determines the final size and placement of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 決定面板的最終大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The final size and placement of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板的最終大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel> class uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.ArrangeOverride%2A> method to lay out the cells that are visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel>類別會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.ArrangeOverride%2A>方法，是可見的儲存格的版面配置設定。

trans-unit.source: Cells that are not visible are virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬化不會顯示的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that should become visible.
trans-unit.target: 應該要變得可見之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the viewport to the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視區捲動至位於所指定索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.BringIndexIntoView(System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.BringIndexIntoView(System.Int32)" /> method; otherwise, important functionality will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.BringIndexIntoView(System.Int32)" />在衍生類別中，請確定呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.BringIndexIntoView(System.Int32)" />方法; 否則便是重要的功能將會停用。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the panel can occupy.
trans-unit.target: 面板可以佔用的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: Determines the desired size of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 決定想要的面板大小。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 預期的面板大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel> class uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.MeasureOverride%2A> method to determine which cells are visible and which cells are virtualized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel>類別會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.MeasureOverride%2A>方法來判斷哪些儲存格會顯示和哪些儲存格是否虛擬化。

trans-unit.source: Called when the collection of children in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 在清除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中的子系集合時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnClearChildren" /> in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnClearChildren" /> method; otherwise, important functionality will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnClearChildren" />在衍生類別中，請確定呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnClearChildren" />方法; 否則便是重要的功能將會停用。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> 屬性值已變更。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method and use it as a notification that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法，並使用它當做通知的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" />屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: Then perform your own logic based on the old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 然後，執行您自己的邏輯根據舊的和新值。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnIsItemsHostChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" /> method; otherwise, important functionality will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 確定呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnIsItemsHostChanged(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)" />方法; 否則便是重要的功能將會停用。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation synchronizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel" /> with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter" /> that it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作同步處理<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel" />與<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridCellsPresenter" />或<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter" />相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> 事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Updates the visible cells when an item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 集合中的項目變更時，更新可見的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsChangedEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請確定呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellsPanel.OnItemsChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ItemsChangedEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
